document_data.name: Shield of winds
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shield of winds''''' was a [[spell]] unique to [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Effects: This spell created an invisible windy barrier by creating strands of chaotic gusts of wind, resulting in a nearly impenetrable wall. Only purely magical weapons such as [[magic missle|''magic missle'']]''s'' could pass through the wall. Enchanted objects like arrows were stopped in their tracks. Either [[dispel magic|''dispel magic'']] or [[anti-magic shell|''anti-magic shell'']] could destroy the wall.
document_data.Components: This spell only required the presence of air to cast.
